de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper

Class Viterbi

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.helper.Viterbi

  • public class Viterbi
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that finds the most probable (=Viterbi) alignment given some model parameters
    Author:
    Carolin Haas (carhaas1@gmail.com)

      Finds the most probable alignment for the given sentences and given model parameters

      Finds the most probable alignment for the given sentences and given model parameters Assumes that probabilities are in the log probability space

    • Method Detail

      • CalculateViterbiHMMLogProb

        public static void CalculateViterbiHMMLogProb(java.lang.String input_path,
                              java.lang.String parameter_directory,
                              FileSystem fs,
                              java.lang.String output_path,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hash_table_reverse_source,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hash_table_reverse_target,
                              int number_reducers)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Finds the most probable alignment for the given sentences and given model parameters Assumes that probabilities are in the log probability space
        Parameters:
        input_path - the file location (not in the HDFS) containing the parallel sentences for which the Viterbi alignment is to be found. First the source sentences, then the distinctive separator " ||| " and then the target sentence.
        parameter_directory - the hadoop output directory in the HDFS from the last iteration
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        output_path - the location of where the result should be written (not in the HDFS)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - handed down from Writer

      • CalculateViterbiHMM

        public static void CalculateViterbiHMM(java.lang.String input_path,
                       java.lang.String parameter_directory,
                       FileSystem fs,
                       java.lang.String output_path,
                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hash_table_reverse_source,
                       java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hash_table_reverse_target,
                       int number_reducers)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Finds the most probable alignment for the given sentences and given model parameters
        Parameters:
        input_path - the file location (not in the HDFS) containing the parallel sentences for which the Viterbi alignment is to be found. First the source sentences, then the distinctive separator " ||| " and then the target sentence.
        parameter_directory - the hadoop output directory in the HDFS from the last iteration
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        output_path - the location of where the result should be written (not in the HDFS)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - handed down from Writer
